LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_OnlySowOnAsh: Certain plants can only be sown on ash terrain.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableDormantVolcano: Enable the generation of dormant volcanos on the world map
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableDormantVolcano_Too: Many of the ashland biomes will only generate near dormant volcanos. As such, disabling this will also prevent those from generating.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_NumberOfDormantVolcano: The number of dormant volcanos that are generated: ({0} volcano/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableActiveVolcano: Enable the generation of active volcanos on the world map
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableActiveVolcano_Tool: The volcanic ashlands biome will only generate near active volcanos. As such, disabling this will also prevent the volcanic ashlands from generating.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_NumberOfActiveVolcano: The number of blighted volcanos that are generated: ({0} volcano/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableBlightedVolcano: Enable the generation of blighted volcanos on the world map
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableBlightedVolcano_To: The blighted ashlands biome will only generate near active volcanos. As such, disabling this will also prevent the blighted ashlands from generating.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_NumberOfBlightedVolcano: The number of blighted volcanos that are generated: ({0} volcano/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableExtinctVolcano: Enable the generation of extinct volcanos on the world map
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableExtinctVolcano_Too: The ashland forest biome will only generate near extinct volcanos. As such, disabling this will also prevent ashland forest from generating.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_NumberOfExtinctVolcano: The number of extinct volcanos that are generated: ({0} volcano/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoMinDistance: The minimum distance between volcanos: ({0} tile/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BiomesMaxDistance: The maximum distance ashland biomes can generate from a volcano: ({0} tile/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoScaleWithWorldSiz: Scale the number of volcanos that are spawned based on world coverage.
The number of volcanos set below will be used for a world generated at 30% coverage.\n(maximum number * ((Planet Coverage * 3) + 10%)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BiomeScaleWithWorldSize: Scale the distance that biomes can generate from volcanos based on world coverage.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BiomeScaleWithWorldSize_: The distance set below will be used for a world generated at 30% coverage.\n(maximum distance * ((Planet Coverage * 3) + 10%).
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BaseBiome_Tooltip: Required for any of the below biomes to generate.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableStandardAshlands: Enable the generation of the standard ashlands base biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableCoralCoastAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland coral coast sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableSwampAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland swamp sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableGrazelandAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland grazelands sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableCragIslandAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland crag islands biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableForestAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland forest base biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableSwampIslandAshland: Enable the generation of the ashland swamp islands biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableMeadowAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland meadows sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableMarshAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland marsh sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableBlightedAshlands: Enable the generation of the blighted ashlands base biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableBlightedCragIsland: Enable the generation of the blighted crag islands biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableBlightedBogAshland: Enable the generation of the blighted bog sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableVolcanicAshlands: Enable the generation of the volcanic ashlands base biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableVolcanicCoralCoast: Enable the generation of the volcanic coral coast sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableVolcanicCragIsland: Enable the generation of the volcanic crag islands biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableVolcanicSulphurPit: Enable the generation of the volcanic sulphur pits sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableVolcanicThermalVal: Enable the generation of the volcanic thermal valley sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableVolcanicBadlandsAs: Enable the generation of the volcanic badlands sub-biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableHighlandAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland highlands biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableSaltplainAshlands: Enable the generation of the ashland saltplains biome.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableExclusiveRocks: Enable ashland biomes generating with custom rock types.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_EnableExclusiveRocks_Too: If this is disabled then ashland biomes will use standard rock types, and custom rock types from this mod will not generate naturally.\n\nDo note that this doesn't remove the new rock types from the game.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoAffectedAreaScale: Scale the distance affected by volcanos based on world coverage.
The distance set below will be used for a world generated at 30% coverage.\n(maximum distance * ((Planet Coverage * 3) + 10%).
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoMaxAffectedArea: The maximum distance affected by volcanos: ({0} tile/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoMaxAffectedArea_T: The maximum distance is increased by 20% with each category level increase. The displayed value is used for a category 5 volcano.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoEnablePermanentCo: Enable volcanos causing permanent conditions to all tiles in their radius.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoEnableRandomCondi: Enable volcanos causing random conditions to tiles within a certain radius.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoEnableCategoryCha: Enable the volcano category change incident.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormCauseBuildup: Enable ash storms causing ash buildup to unprotected pawns.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormAffectsCaravan: Ash storms also cause ash buildup to pawns in caravans.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormBuildupMult: Multiplier for the amount of ash buildup pawns receive: ({0}%)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormCauseBlinded: Enable ash storms randomly blinding unprotected pawns.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormBlindedChance: The chance a pawn is blinded: ({0}%)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormCauseCloggedServ: Enable ash storms randomly clogging the servos of mechanical pawns.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormCloggedServoChan: The chance a pawn receives a clogged servo: ({0}%)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormDamagePlants: Enable ash storms randomly damaging unprotected plants.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormAvgPlantDamage: The average amount of damage a plant receives: ({0} points)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormDamageBuildings: Enable ash storms randomly damaging certain buildings.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_AshStormBreakdownBuildin: Enable ash storms randomly causing certain buildings to breakdown.
The chance a building has a breakdown: ({0}%)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightAnimals: Enable blighted ash storms randomly blighting wild animals.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightPlayerA: Blighted ash storms can also blight player faction animals.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightNonPlay: Blighted ash storms can also blight non-player faction animals.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightPlants: Enable blighted ash storms randomly blighting crops.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightWildPla: Blighted ash storms can also blight wild plants.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_BlightStormBlightPlantsN: The average number of randomly selected plants blighted at once: ({0} plants)
